notes.text:
I used this deck to reach DLv MAX in the KC Cup and exclusively for my KoG run (both on the same day)!

In the KC Cup, I subbed Wall of Disruption for Divine Wrath to better counter Gladiators which also helped against Sphere Kuriboh as well as in the mirror match (and Beatdown variant). 

On my Legend 3 climb, I mostly faced Dino decks and CAffira. I won most games against both decks. Dinos run heavy backrow hate so I'd always activate Beast Rising(BR)/Hazy Glory (HG) in my opponents Draw Phase so it wouldn't get pinned by Gyokkou. Alternatively, if you have both BR and HG set and your opponent used Gyokkou, you can chain your face down and then chain what they targeted - so they effectively waste a Gyokkou and clog their own backrow. 

Against CAffira you ideally want to go second and open with Soul Exchange and a Hazy monster so you can tribute the Dakini/Saffira they summoned. Floodgate, Wall of Disruption and Curse of Anubis all help a lot in this matchup.

My 5 games to KoG were pretty relaxed. 2 Dinos, 1 CAffira, 1 Six Sams and 1 Ghostrick Astral/Spirit Barrier (so glad they didn't get the combo off!) 

Good luck to everyone in the KC Cup!
